question: Which of the following is a programme launched by the government that aims to develop the skills of youth for employment in the growing Solar Energy Power projects and to generate new entrepreneurs in Solar Energy sector?
explanation: Suryamitra programme has been launched for the creation of a qualified technical workforce in the solar energy sector. National Institute of Solar Energy (NISE), an autonomous institution of Ministry of New and Renewable Energy (MNRE) has launched this programme in collaboration with State Nodal Agencies, at various locations across the country. In order to enrol in this programme, the candidate must have passed class 10th and ITI in Electrician/Wireman/Electronics Mechanic/Fitter/ Sheet Metal, not below 18 years or should have Diploma in Electrical, Mechanical or Electronics.
